name: black barghest
dieMessage: a black @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@barghest@c-reset@ collapses in death, with blood leaking out of its jaws.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ growls, bearing its putrid, rotting fangs before attempting to bite @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ howls loud enough for its call to be heard echoing off the nearby mountains, as it charges towards @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ springs high into the air, lunging toward @player-name@'s face!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ builds up an incredible amount of speed as it runs toward @player-name@, sinking its jaws into @player-name@'s side and clawing at @player-name@ while they are unable to escape!
The @npc-color-name@ latches onto @player-name@ with its powerful jaws and rips violently into @player-name@'s flesh as it tears into @player-name@ from side to side!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ sniffs around the forest floor, quietly growling as if angered.
